item.title: Countdown to WPF
item.description: Back in January 2006, when Microsoft was preparing to release the .NET Framework 2.0 and, with it, the Windows Presentation Foundation, countdowns seemed to pop up everywhere: Dazzling Graphics: Top Ten UI Development Breakthroughs In Windows Presentation Foundation
